tasks.title: Water
tasks.description: Water the Monstera when the top 2 inches of soil are dry, typically every 7-10 days in Lisbon's climate.

tasks.title: Mist Leaves
tasks.description: Mist the leaves with water to increase humidity, especially in Lisbon's dry indoor air.

tasks.title: Clean Leaves
tasks.description: Wipe the leaves with a damp cloth to remove dust and improve photosynthesis.

tasks.title: Fertilize
tasks.description: Apply a balanced liquid fertilizer diluted to half strength during the growing season (spring and summer).

tasks.title: Rotate Plant
tasks.description: Rotate the Monstera 90 degrees to ensure even growth and prevent leaning toward light.

tasks.title: Check for Pests
tasks.description: Inspect leaves and stems for common pests like spider mites or mealybugs.
